thread.title: Hearn, Hubbard, Thompson share Las Vegas lead
thread.title_full: Hearn, Hubbard, Thompson share Las Vegas lead

title: Hearn, Hubbard, Thompson share Las Vegas lead
text:
Hearn, Hubbard, Thompson share Las Vegas lead AP Oct 22, 2015 at 9:36p ET 0Shares 
LAS VEGAS (AP) Canada's David Hearn birdied his final three holes in perfect morning conditions for a 7-under 64 and a share of the lead Thursday in the Shriners Hospitals for Children Open. 
Michael Thompson , Mark Hubbard and Tyler Aldridge also topped the leaderboard at TPC Summerlin. Aldridge had two holes left when first-round play was suspended because of darkness. 
Kizzire is making his first start as a PGA Tour member after winning twice last year on the Web.com Tour and topping the regular-season and finals-combined money lists. He was married Saturday. 
Jimmy Walker opened with a 66, and U.S. Presidents Cup teammate Rickie Fowler had a 72. 0
